title: BTC/USD Analysis: Is Bitcoin a Safe Haven as Market Cap Hits 2021 Levels?
description: Bitcoin’s market share hits a 4-year high, sparking debate about its role as a safe haven asset. On-chain data and technical analysis suggest $93,000-$95,000 is a critical price range. Bitcoin ETFs are seeing increased inflows, particularly BlackRock’s IBIT, signaling potential bullish movement. Crypto regulation remains complex, with some states like New Hampshire moving forward while […]The post BTC/USD Analysis: Is Bitcoin a Safe Haven as Market Cap Hits 2021 Levels? appeared first on Action Forex.
